title: Little Big Planet 3 [PS3] [ODE iso]
description:
Language: English

Sackboy is back, this time with playable new friends in an all new handcrafted adventure. In LittleBigPlanet 3, Sackboy is transported to a new planet called Bunkum, a creative paradise where abundant ideas drift through the sky. Unwittingly, Sackboy helps release three mythical creatures called the Titans who aim to ruin Bunkum and transform the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most unskilled Creator, Newton, into a terrible monster. To restore balance to the land, Sackboy is going to need help in the form of Bunkum's ancient heroes: Toggle, OddSock and Swoop.

In a franchise first, LittleBigPlanet 3 introduces three brand new playable characters -- Toggle, OddSock and Swoop -- each with their own unique abilities and personalities. Sackboy must learn to work with his new friends throughout his new adventure. LBP3 also introduces even more layers of z-axis depth. In Create mode, the added layers and diversity of characters offers limitless possibilities for User Generated Content (UGC). Create tools have also been redesigned to be more accessible and robust in LittleBigPlanet 3. The Create mode also has new powerful tools for more gameplay and customization possibilities for seasoned Creators. As with LBP2, LBP3Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s Adventure mode was designed using solely Create tools so possibilities are endless. Anyone can create their own worlds!
